cab.content: DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.SECRET.C.P. 322 (30). Copy Wo. - ^ CAB I N E T. EiXTERNAL TRADE OF TEE UKITED KINGDOM, DOMINIONS AMD INDIA w .TT H BRITISH. AND FOREIGN COUNTRIES - DRAFT WHITE PAPER. Note by tho President of the Board of Trade. With reference to Cabinet 65 (30), Conclusion 4, I clroulate, for the consideration of my colleagues, the accompanying draft White Paper, Xi the draft White Paper is approved, it is proposed. before publication tc insert in Table 1 for Canada (pages 2 and 3) figures for the calendar yearn 1927, 1928 and 1929 instead of for the trade years onded 31st March. This alteration will enable the figures in Tablo II for Canada (pages 10 and 11) to be oompared directly with the figures in Table I.Board of Trade, 3rd October, 1930. [This Document is the Property oi His Britannic Majesty's Government (Printed for the Cabinet, September, 1930.), 312CONFIDENTIAL.CP. 322 (30). CABINET. EXTERNAL TRADE OF THE UNITED KINGDOM, THE DOMINIONS & INDIA with british & FOREIGN COUNTRIES, Distinguishing Principal Classes of Goods.DRAFT WHITE PAPER.(C15S0) TABLE 11.
